entities.name: mundungu
entities.description: Mundungus is a monster that Harry has to fight. It is described as having loud cracks when it attacks.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who might murder Mundungu, implying he has some kind of authority or power over the monster.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who fights against Mundungu and helps Mrs. Figg. He is described as being able to barely walk due to Dudley's bulk.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is a person who is semiconscious and has a large bulk, making it difficult for Harry to move around him.

entities.name: mrs. figg
entities.description: Mrs. Figg is a person who helps Harry fight against Mundungu and takes him to the door of Privet Drive.

relationships.description: Harry fights against Mundungu, as described in the text: 'And with another loud crack, he vanished.'
Harry helps Dudley by giving him a heave and staggering onward.
Mrs. Figg helps Harry by taking him to the door of Privet Drive.
